abstract.text: manages the authentication and session state for the Volt app.

inlineContent.text: This class handles all operations related to user authentication including login, logout, and user session management. It integrates with various authentication providers like Firebase, DocuSign, and biometric authentication. It also manages the user interface state related to authentication processes.
to ensure thread-safe access to its properties and methods.

Volt is a comprehensive platform designed to manage various aspects of apprenticeship and training programs. It integrates several functionalities, from user management to course handling, making it an all-encompassing solution for educational and professional development needs.
